beans:
<bean id="CatalogoPagoDao" class=com.allshop.framework.persistence.catalogo.pago.dao.CatalogoPagoDaoImpl">
INSERT INTO CATPAGO( LANG_TP_CD,ID_PAGO,COD_PAGO,DESC_PAGO,STATUS_FLAG,EXPIRY_DT,LAST_UPDATE_DT,LAST_UPDATE_TX_ID,LAST_UPDATE_USER)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE CATPAGO SET LANG_TP_CD=?,ID_PAGO=?,COD_PAGO=?,DESC_PAGO=?,STATUS_FLAG=?,EXPIRY_DT=?,LAST_UPDATE_DT=?,LAST_UPDATE_TX_ID=?,LAST_UPDATE_USER=? WHERE ID_PAGO=?
SELECT LANG_TP_CD,ID_PAGO,COD_PAGO,DESC_PAGO,STATUS_FLAG,EXPIRY_DT,LAST_UPDATE_DT,LAST_UPDATE_TX_ID,LAST_UPDATE_USER FROM CATPAGO ORDER BY ID_PAGO
SELECT MAX(LANG_TP_CD) + 1 FROM CATPAGO
